mapper.sql: lev_num , emp_id , appr , appr_state , appr_date , appl_date , lev_type , lev_title , lev_content , start_date , end_date , lev_term
mapper.select: SELECT lev_id, lev_num, lev_title, appl_date, appr_state FROM lev_table WHERE emp_id = #{empId}
SELECT lev_id , lev_num , emp_id , appr , appr_state , appr_date , appl_date , lev_type , lev_title , lev_content FROM lev_table where lev_num = #{levNum}

select lev_id, lev_num, emp_table.emp_name, appr, pstn_code.job_name, hdqrt_code.hq_name, dep_code.dep_name, appr_state ,appl_date, appr_date, lev_type, lev_title, lev_content, start_date, end_date, lev_term FROM lev_table INNER JOIN emp_table ON lev_table.emp_id = emp_table.emp_id INNER JOIN pstn_code ON pstn_code.job_code = emp_table.job_code INNER JOIN hdqrt_code ON hdqrt_code.hq_code = emp_table.hq_code INNER JOIN dep_code ON dep_code.dep_no = emp_table.dep_no WHERE lev_id = #{levId};

select emp_id, hdqrt_code.hq_name,dep_code.dep_name,pstn_code.job_name, emp_name from emp_table as et INNER JOIN pstn_code ON pstn_code.job_code = et.job_code INNER JOIN hdqrt_code ON hdqrt_code.hq_code = et.hq_code INNER JOIN dep_code ON dep_code.dep_no = et.dep_no

SELECT emp_id, emp_name, hdqrt_code.hq_name, dep_code.dep_name FROM emp_table as bb INNER JOIN hdqrt_code ON hdqrt_code.hq_code = bb.hq_code INNER JOIN dep_code ON dep_code.dep_no = bb.dep_no WHERE bb.emp_id = #{empId}
mapper.insert: insert into lev_table(appr, appl_date, lev_title, lev_type, start_date, end_date, lev_term, lev_content, emp_id, maj_code, appr_id) values (#{appr}, now(), #{levTitle}, #{levType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{levTerm}, #{levContent}, #{empId}, "인사", #{apprId})
